file_content.text: The Regulators are cowards. Bleed us dry, then stab us in the back when it matters. Butchers and scum, just like every mercenary.
Not true. I served in Qorvin's Light Battalion. You couldn't pay us to slaughter civilians, unlike these idiots.
I thought you worked security. You never said you'd been a mercenary.
Makeb is my home, but I'll happily take my years of battle experience offworld if you have doubts about my loyalty.
No, no. Look, just help me set up this barricade.
